name: Sammiche For Your Troubles
description: The duality of mind and body is a tough thing to balance, so why not do it with a good sandwich?! Feed the body and soul of hungry customers. Assemble special sandwiches made to satisfy the hunger and emotional needs of all your customers! Read people's moods and build them a sandwich that balances out their mood! Utilize a wide range of ingredients such as; salami, hot sauce, water, bugs and so much more! Each ingredient has it's own emotional properties which can be viewed by hovering over their respective dispenser. Be sure to give each customer the opposite of what their feeling, a good balance of feelings is key!
